title: Put 2D array data in an ArrayList - write code

content.question: Which of the following can replace /* missing code */ to produce this result?

choices.label: for (int j = 0; j < mat.length; j++) { for (int k = 0; k <= mat[0].length; k++) { result.add(mat[j][k]); } }
for (int j = 0; j < mat.length; j++) { for (int k = mat[0].length - 1; k >= 0; k--) { result.add(mat[j][k]); } }
for (int j = mat.length - 1; j >= 0; j--) { for (int k = 0; k <= mat[0].length; k++) { result.add(mat[j][k]); } }
for (int j = mat.length - 1; j >= 0; j--) { for (int k = mat[0].length - 1; k >= 0; k--) { result.add(mat[j][k]); } }

content.answer: for (int j = 0; j < mat.length; j++) { for (int k = mat[0].length - 1; k >= 0; k--) { result.add(mat[j][k]); } }

skill.text: 2.B: Write program code involving data abstractions.
